ol.li: Stable Internet Connection: Required for downloading and configuring the VPN.
Compatible Device: VPN software should support your operating system (Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS, Router).
VPN Subscription or Self-Hosted Server: Choose a VPN provider (e.g., NordVPN, ExpressVPN) or set up your own (OpenVPN, WireGuard).
Administrative Access: Needed to install software and change network settings.
Firewall & Security Configuration: Ensure your firewall allows VPN connections.
Login Credentials or VPN Configuration File : Provided by your VPN provider or manually configured for self-hosted setups.
